thread.title: Oh No! This Bollywood Actor Was Robbed In Thailand
thread.title_full: Oh No! This Bollywood Actor Was Robbed In Thailand

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Oh No! This Bollywood Actor Was Robbed In Thailand
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 28 . 2017 Gurmeet Choudhary 
Gurmeet Choudhary was recently holidaying in Pattaya, Thailand with his wife, Debina Bonnerjee . The couple was there for the latter’s extended birthday celebrations, but the trip did not end on a very happy note for them. 
While shopping in a local market on the last day of their trip, Gurmeet’s travel bag went missing. The actor lost Rs 60,000 and a few personal belongings, including a pair of sunglasses worth Rs. 1 lakh. Although he immediately blocked his debit and credit cards, he could not lodge a police complaint as they were leaving for India that day only. Luckily, he had kept his passport in Debina’s bag. 
Phew!
